actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department, Labor Department, Agriculture Department.
Subcommittee on Estate and Gift Taxation. Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 98-387.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Estate and Gift Taxation

official_title: A bill for the relief of the estate of Elizabeth Schultz Rabe.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to allow a credit against the tax imposed on the estate of a named individual for the conveyance by such individual's estate of specified real property located in Nevada for addition to the Toiyabe National Forest.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the estate of Elizabeth Schultz Rabe.
